attributes.action: ensure that the Belper Jobcentre in Derbyshire remains open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jobcentre Plus management are consulting as to whether to close    the Jobcentre in Belper. The jobcentre provides an essential local public service to the people of the area
claiming benefits or seeking a new job.    The next nearest offices, if closure goes ahead, will involve a    lengthy journey through rural countryside that will be costly for people struggling on benefits.   The Belper Jobcentre provides advice to the elderly and to other essential public services providing a signposting service for the most needy in society.  
       It must remain open!
